attributes.action: ensure that all indigenous drinking water sources are held, or taken back into UK public ownership.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: UK's indigenous Drinking Water sources are essential to human life and must be held, or taken back, into UK public control. Private companies, wherever they are located, must not be allowed gain or retain control of our drinking water, its sources, or rights that may inhibit in any way UK citizen's access thereto.
